author: wtopstaff
title: Bruins-Avalanche Sum
text:
1—2 
First Period_1, Boston, K.Miller 1 (Chara, Connolly), 5:49. 2, Boston, Hayes 1 (Chara, C.Miller), 8:11. 
Second Period_3, Boston, Randell 1 (McQuaid), 3:46. 4, Boston, Kelly 1 (Spooner, Hayes), 9:30. 5, Boston, Spooner 1 (Hayes), 15:32. 6, Colorado, Landeskog 4, 18:31 (pp). 
Third Period_7, Colorado, Mitchell 3 (Zadorov, Barrie), 11:20. 8, Boston, Krejci 3 (Hayes), 18:31 (en). 
Shots on Goal_Boston 9-11-5_25. Colorado 5-6-11_22. 
Goalies_Boston, Gustavsson. Colorado, Varlamov, Berra. A_15,082 (18,007). T_2:17. Topics:
